titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the General Land Office automated records project. Michigan [electronic resource] pre-1908 homestead & cash entry patents and cadastral survey plat index.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: General Land Office automated records project. Michigan [electronic resource] pre-1908 homestead & cash entry patents and cadastral survey plat index.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: [Springfield, Va.?] : U.S. Dept. of the Interior, Bureau of Land Management, Eastern States ; [Washington, D.C.? : Supt. of Docs., U.S. G.P.O., distributor, 1994]

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Title on container spine: General Land Office automated records, Michigan.

archdesc.scopecontent: Contains pre-1908 federal land patent information including homesteads and cash sales. Database is searchable by name, land office, county, state, or legal land description. Also contains survey plat information, searchable by name and date of survey.

subject.term: General Land Office automated records, Michigan.
